p: Out of the total of nine premature infants with severe (grade 4) IVH enrolled in this trial, three received a low‐dose (5 × 10 6 cells/kg) of human UCB‐derived MSCs, and the remaining six received a high‐dose (1 × 10 7 cells/kg), (Table 1). Gestational age, birth weight, and postnatal age of MSC transplant recipients were 26.1 ± 2.1 weeks (range 24–30 weeks), 767 ± 231 g (range 440–1,310 g), and 11.6 ± 2.6 days (range 7–15 days), respectively. Clinical variables, including gestational age, birth weight, sex, Apgar scores, and antenatal findings of low and high dose groups are presented in Table 2. In the low dose group, all enrolled infants were female, and only male infants were enrolled in the high dose group.
